title: NeuralViz Dashboard
subtitle: Real-time ML model monitoring platform
description: A comprehensive dashboard for monitoring machine learning models in production. Features real-time performance metrics, drift detection, and automated alerting systems built with a modern React frontend.
story: This project emerged from a recurring pain point — teams deploying ML models had no unified way to observe model degradation in production. I spent three months building what I wished existed: a tool that speaks the language of both data scientists and DevOps engineers.

title: Khela — Sports Analytics
subtitle: Bangladesh cricket performance intelligence
description: End-to-end sports analytics platform aggregating Bangladesh cricket data. Provides per-player heatmaps, match outcome predictions, and interactive tournament brackets with ML-driven insights.
story: Growing up watching cricket in Dhaka, I always felt the statistics presented in broadcasts were surface-level. Khela was my attempt to build the analytics engine I wished existed for Bangladesh cricket.

title: Kartik — Supply Chain OS
subtitle: AI-driven procurement & inventory intelligence
description: An intelligent supply chain operating system for SMEs in South Asia. Features demand forecasting, supplier risk scoring, and automated PO generation. Reduced procurement cycles by 40% in pilot.
story: After consulting with textile manufacturers in Narayanganj, I realized their entire procurement process was run on WhatsApp and Excel. Kartik was designed to be the first supply chain tool that truly fits that context.

title: Borno — Language Preservation
subtitle: Digital archive for endangered South Asian scripts
description: A crowdsourced digital preservation platform for endangered scripts and dialects of the Bengal region. Uses computer vision to digitize handwritten manuscripts and AI to generate pronunciation guides.
story: My grandmother spoke a dialect that has no digital presence. This project is deeply personal — a love letter to the languages slipping away, built with the tools that might save them.
